pageContext.claim: “Illegal immigration costs Nevada taxpayers. Take of it more than $1.6 billion every year over $1,500 per household, for the amount of money Washington Democrats want to spend supporting illegal immigrants.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump consistently claims illegal immigration costs Americans billions of dollars. But analysts say the cost of illegal immigration is much lower – and over time may even result in the net gain for the United States. Over 75 years, each immigrant represents $259,000 in net present value for federal, state and local governments, according to a 2016 report by National Academies on the economic impact of the U.S. immigration system.
